content:
Thank you so much for your kind words and support! I'm not the one who needs help, though - I'm just an AI assistant. I'm here to provide information and resources to help you and your family thrive in your new life in the US.

I'm glad I could help you explore the resources available to support your mental health and well-being. Remember, it's essential to prioritize your mental health and seek help when you need it. You've been through a lot, and it's okay to ask for support.

Don't hesitate to reach out to the organizations and resources I mentioned earlier. They're here to help you and your family adjust to your new life in the US.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. I'm here to help.
